name: 9th Anniversary Supply Drop Requisition
description:
The 9th Anniversary Supply Drop
Use this to sign your account up for weekly 9th Anniversary Supply Drops. Receive the first drop immediately and three more between now and September 7.

First Drop:
5 Black Lion Chest Keys, a Golden Black Lion Chest Key, 2 Guaranteed Wardrobe Unlocks, and a Black Lion Claim Ticket.
Second Drop:
A Black Lion Backpack and Glider Combo Voucher, a Black Lion Weapon Voucher, and 2 Black Lion Miniature Claim Tickets.
Third Drop:
A Deep Wilds Mount Select License, a choice of one Mistborn, Curious Creatures, Bizarre Beasts, or Lost Era Mount Select License or a Deep Wilds Mount Adoption License, a Mini Green Raptor Hatchling, a Mini Brown Springer Kit, a Mini Yellow Jackal Pup, a Mini Red Griffon Hatchling, a Mini Blue Skimmer Pup, and a Mini Red Shiba Inu.
Fourth Drop:
A Black Lion Outfit Voucher, a Black Lion Chair Voucher, and a Black Lion Booster Box.
